posts.post_title: FS:  Beater T206 Cobb Bat Off (Taking Offers)
posts.post_content:
Posted By: T206Collector
While I am always open to "offers too good to refuse," the card is, for all intents and purposes, currently off the market.

Thanks to all those who inquired.
